commit message:
Revert 'Add Toolbar shadow por API>=21'

This reverts commit 51e3f10cf4d5ae13be2deaf2a93b4cb862f09ee7.

Added 2 features for rooted phones : - Clear cache and - Clear data. MLManagerApplication is created to provide single instace of AppPreferences. Earlier multiple instances were being created which is not required. RootUtils added for checking some root related info. Tested on a few rooted and unrooted phones.

Merge pull request #16 from vijayrawatsan/ClearCacheClearDataForRoot

Added 2 new features for rooted phones.
More asynchronous, add Snackbar and optimizations
Fix FC when Navigation Drawer is null
Add 'Hidden Apps' and improve code (app starts 50% faster)
Remove Japanese and Portuguese translations until completed
